subtitleNullable: Global 2000: The World's Largest Public Companies (2017-2021)
descriptionNullable:
Since 2003, Forbes’ Global 2000 list has measured the world’s largest public companies in terms of four equally weighted metrics: assets, market value, sales, and profits. 
This dataset contains the list of the top 2000 companies every year for the past 5 years (2017-2021). 
This means it covers the post-pandemic situation as well as during the pandemic situation, hence we can analyze how the world's biggest public companies
endured the pandemic.

Please Note: The industry section isn't there for the year 2020 & 2021, hence I removed it for all the years for convinience
